Author: The Tim Ferriss Show
Title: #391: The Random Show - On Fasting, Forest Bathing, How to Say NO, Rebooting the Self, and Much More
Annotation: Mushroom plugs, drill holes about an inch deep in branches that you cut from trees and pound in plugs then put thin layer of wax and cover with shade cloth water daily. Lions mane chopped up and sauted with butter. Good for the brain

Author: The Tim Ferriss Show
Annotation: Build a challenge network aka a cohort of people to rely on to give unvarnished feedback

Author: The Tim Ferriss Show
Annotation: Writing - if you have to remove 20% of chapter what would you remove or if you could only save 10/20% what should I absolutely keep in. If two people say absolutely remove then take seriously. Keep something only requires a vote of one.

Author: The Tim Ferriss Show
Annotation: If people in room nervous to give feedback, team up with senior team member and tee it up to have them be brutal in criticism and meet that with curiosity and respect to set the precedent.

Author: The Tim Ferriss Show
Annotation: When get out of presentation/speech, always ask whatÕs the one thing I can do better

Author: The Tim Ferriss Show
Annotation: Write like you teach not like youÕre writing a journal article
